Discussions.Discussion_Name: Wrong info on tutorial: WAVE application

Messages.Author: Sangyoung Park
Messages.Content: Please change the code in NumVehicleMsg.msg  import veins.base.utils.Coord; import veins.modules.messages.BaseFrame1609_4; import veins.base.utils.SimpleAddress;  namespace veins;  packet NumVehicleMsg extends BaseFrame1609_4 {           Coord senderPos;           int numVehicles;           simtime_t timeStampP;           LAddress::L2Type senderAddress = -1; }
